name: You Are (Not) Welcome Here
description:
Don't stumble into places you don't belong, or you might get hurt...

Thrown into a strange place, with a strange person talking to you, you most find your way back. Will you be helped, or hurt?

WARNING: This game contains flashing lights, potentially loud sounds, and may not be suitable for young audiences. See README.html for legal information, credits, and more.

Created for Let's Create Jam #2. Go check out everyones entries!

Controls (can be reconfigured in game):

  • WASD to move
  • Space to jump
  • E to interact with objects
  • F to toggle flash light
  • Left click to use the red soul stone
  • Right click to use the blue soul stone
  • Escape to return to the title screen

NOTES:

  • If you don't know what to do next, try looking around! Blowing out all the candles of the same color helps (sometimes there is more than two candles...)
  • Have an issue? Report it here on the comments!

Change log:

Version 0.2.0: * Fixed most of the player collision issues * Added the ability to skip dialog * Added the ability to change the volume for all the audio in the game * Added the ability to rebind controls and change the mouse sensitivity * Removed Xbox 360 controller support (for now) * Small fixes and improvements Version 0.1.0: * Initial release!

----------------------

Check out the developer log to keep up to date with the game! You can also follow me on here, or on twitter to keep up with games I make in the future!
